DOC.brief_summary: In patients with polycystic kidney disease, pain may be resistant to drug therapy and may reduce quality of life. This study investigate the effect of renal denervation on this pain.
DOC.brief_title: Renal Sympathetic Denervation for Reduction of Pain and Improvement of Insulin Sensitivity in Adult Polycystic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Pain limiting daily activities in spite of pain killers, ADPKD Pregnancy
